lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade's pregame routine has sparked a bit of an international incident, with some Canadians saying Sunday that he disrespected their national anthem.

headline.print_headline: Wade's Shots During Canadian Anthem Spark Some Outrage
headline.main: Wade's Shots During Canadian Anthem Spark Some Outrage

snippet: Dwyane Wade's pregame routine has sparked a bit of an international incident, with some Canadians saying Sunday that he disrespected their national anthem....
